trans-unit.source: The serialization store is closed. New objects cannot be added to a closed store.
trans-unit.target: 序列化存放區已關閉。新物件無法加入已關閉的存放區。

trans-unit.source: Complete deserialization of {0} failed.
trans-unit.target: 對 {0} 的完整序列化失敗。

trans-unit.source: This type of serialization store is not supported. Use a store returned by the CreateStore method.
trans-unit.target: 不支援這種類型的序列化存放區。請使用 CreateStore 方法傳回的存放區。

trans-unit.source: Adding event '{0}'
trans-unit.target: 正在加入事件 '{0}'

trans-unit.source: Unhandled VT: {0}.
trans-unit.target: 未處理的 VT: {0}。

trans-unit.source: Double cannot be converted to a date.
trans-unit.target: Double 無法轉換為 Date。

trans-unit.source: Integer cannot be converted to a float.
trans-unit.target: Integer 無法轉換為 Float。

trans-unit.source: The container cannot be disposed at design time.
trans-unit.target: 這個容器無法在設計階段處置。

trans-unit.source: Cannot create a view for this design surface because the designer is not loaded.
trans-unit.target: 因為沒有載入設計工具，所以無法建立這個設計介面的檢視。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while loading the document. Fix the error, and then try loading the document again. The error message follows:\r\n\r\n{0}
trans-unit.target: 載入文件時發生錯誤。請修正錯誤，然後重新嘗試載入文件。錯誤訊息為:\r\n\r\n{0}

trans-unit.source: The designer loader did not provide a root component but has not indicated why.
trans-unit.target: 設計工具載入器未提供根元件，也未指明原因。

trans-unit.source: The designer loaded, but it does not offer a view compatible with this design surface.
trans-unit.target: 設計工具已載入，但是它並未提供與這個設計介面相容的檢視。

trans-unit.source: The service {0} cannot be removed from the service container.
trans-unit.target: 無法從服務容器移除服務 {0}。

trans-unit.source: Could not find method '{0}'
trans-unit.target: 找不到方法 '{0}'

trans-unit.source: Cannot remove or destroy inherited component '{0}'.
trans-unit.target: 無法移除或摧毀繼承的元件 '{0}'。

trans-unit.source: Cannot add an instance of {0} to the designer because it would create a circular dependency. Make sure that the type does not have the same namespace and type name as the root component {1}.
trans-unit.target: 無法將 {0} 的執行個體加入設計工具，因為它可能會產生循環相依。請確定類型的命名空間和類型名稱與根元件 {1} 不相同。

trans-unit.source: Failure initializing the designer. It has no Component member.
trans-unit.target: 無法初始化這個設計工具。它沒有元件成員。

trans-unit.source: Deleting '{0}'.
trans-unit.target: 正在刪除 '{0}'。

trans-unit.source: The name {0} is already in use by another component.
trans-unit.target: 已經有另一個元件使用這個名稱 {0}。

trans-unit.source: Component of type {0} could not be created. Make sure the type implements IComponent and provides an appropriate public constructor. Appropriate constructors either take no parameters or take a single IContainer parameter.
trans-unit.target: 無法建立 {0} 類型的元件。請確認該類型會實作 IComponent 並且提供正確的公用建構函式。正確的建構函式應該不接受參數，或者只接受一個 IContainer 參數。

trans-unit.source: No Description Available
trans-unit.target: 沒有可用的描述

trans-unit.source: A designer loader has already been configured for this design surface.
trans-unit.target: 已經對這個設計介面設定了設計工具載入器。

trans-unit.source: The designer transaction '{0}' cannot be committed or canceled because nested transaction '{1}' is still active. Commit or cancel the nested transaction first.
trans-unit.target: 設計工具異動 '{0}' 無法認可或取消，因為巢狀異動 '{1}' 仍然在作用中。請先認可或取消巢狀異動。

trans-unit.source: Cannot open a designer for the file because the class within it does not inherit from a class that can be visually designed.
trans-unit.target: 無法開啟這個檔案的設計工具，因為它裡面的類別不會從能以視覺化方式設計的類別繼承。

trans-unit.source: There is no designer for the class {0}.
trans-unit.target: 沒有類別 {0} 的設計工具。

trans-unit.source: New components cannot be added while a designer is unloading.
trans-unit.target: 無法在卸載設計工具時加入新元件。

trans-unit.source: Optimized Code Generation
trans-unit.target: 最佳化程式碼產生

trans-unit.source: Code Generation Settings
trans-unit.target: 程式碼產生設定

trans-unit.source: InSitu Editing
trans-unit.target: InSitu 編輯

trans-unit.source: Controls whether InSitu editing is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 控制是否啟用 InSitu 編輯。

trans-unit.source: Enable InSitu Editing
trans-unit.target: 啟用 InSitu 編輯

trans-unit.source: Sets the default X and Y grid setting on designers when LayoutMode = SnapToGrid.
trans-unit.target: 在 LayoutMode = SnapToGrid 時，進行設計工具的預設 X 和 Y 格線設定。

trans-unit.source: Default Grid Cell Size
trans-unit.target: 預設方格窗格中的儲存格大小

trans-unit.source: Layout Settings
trans-unit.target: 配置設定

trans-unit.source: Controls whether designer smart tag windows should be shown by default.
trans-unit.target: 控制設計工具智慧標籤視窗是否應依預設顯示。

trans-unit.source: Automatically Open Smart Tags
trans-unit.target: 自動開啟智慧標籤

trans-unit.source: Object Bound Smart Tag Settings
trans-unit.target: 物件已繫結智慧標籤設定

trans-unit.source: Enabled optimized code generation. Some controls may not be compatible with this mode. For this change to take effect, Visual Studio must be closed and re-opened.
trans-unit.target: 已啟用最佳化程式碼產生。某些控制項可能與此模式不相容。若要讓這項變更生效，必須關閉 Visual Studio 然後重新開啟。

trans-unit.source: Controls whether designers should display a sizing grid when LayoutMode = SnapToGrid.
trans-unit.target: 控制在 LayoutMode = SnapToGrid 時，設計工具是否應顯示調整大小的格線。

trans-unit.source: Show Grid
trans-unit.target: 顯示格線

trans-unit.source: Controls whether designers should snap to grid dots when LayoutMode = SnapToGrid.
trans-unit.target: 控制在 LayoutMode = SnapToGrid 時，設計工具是否應貼齊格線點。

trans-unit.source: Snap to Grid
trans-unit.target: 貼齊格線

trans-unit.source: Controls whether designers should show smart tag popup windows.
trans-unit.target: 控制設計工具是否應顯示智慧標籤快顯視窗。

trans-unit.source: Controls whether designers should use snap lines. If true, snap lines will be used as guides. If false, grid lines will be used.
trans-unit.target: 控制設計工具是否應使用對齊線。如果為 true，就會使用對齊線來對齊。如果為 false，就會使用格線。

trans-unit.source: .NET Component
trans-unit.target: .NET 元件

trans-unit.source: This IDataObject doesn't support SetData.
trans-unit.target: 此 IDataObject 不支援 SetData。

trans-unit.source: The extender provider {0} has already been added as an extender. Adding another would result in duplicate properties.
trans-unit.target: 已經將擴充性提供者 {0} 加入做為擴充項。加入另一個會產生重複的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Read-Only
trans-unit.target: 唯讀

trans-unit.source: This method/object is not implemented by design.
trans-unit.target: 此方法/物件並非由設計實作。

trans-unit.source: Winforms Designer is not supported on this platform.
trans-unit.target: 此平台不支援 WinForms Designer。

trans-unit.source: You cannot create a new session because this serialization manager already has an active serialization session.
trans-unit.target: 無法建立新工作階段，因為這個序列化管理員已經有使用中的序列化工作階段。

trans-unit.source: Duplicate declaration of member '{0}'
trans-unit.target: 成員 '{0}' 重複宣告

trans-unit.source: The name '{0}' is already used by another object.
trans-unit.target: 其他物件已經使用名稱 '{0}'。

trans-unit.source: Type '{0}' does not have a constructor with parameters of types {1}.
trans-unit.target: 類型 '{0}' 沒有類型 {1} 參數的建構函式。

trans-unit.source: This method cannot be invoked because the serialization manager does not have an active serialization session.
trans-unit.target: 無法叫用這個方法，因為這個序列化管理員沒有使用中的序列化工作階段。

trans-unit.source: Cannot name the object '{0}' because it is already named '{1}'.
trans-unit.target: 無法命名物件 '{0}'，因為已經命名為 '{1}'。

trans-unit.source: This method cannot be invoked because the serialization manager has an active serialization session.
trans-unit.target: 無法叫用這個方法，因為這個序列化管理員有使用中的序列化工作階段。

trans-unit.source: Elements of type {0} are not supported. The serializer expects the element to be one of the following: {1}.
The field '{0}' could not be found on the target object. Make sure that the field is defined as an instance variable on the target object and has the correct scope.
trans-unit.target: 在目標物件上找不到欄位 '{0}'。請確定欄位是定義為目標物件上的執行個體變數，並且具有正確的範圍。

trans-unit.source: Array rank '{0}' is too high. Visual Studio can only save and load arrays with a rank of 1.
trans-unit.target: 陣列陣序規範 '{0}' 太高。Visual Studio 只能儲存並載入陣序規範為 1 的陣列。

trans-unit.source: Code statements for the object '{0}' were lost during serialization. This may have been a result of another object misbehaving during serialization.
trans-unit.target: 物件 '{0}' 的程式碼陳述式在序列化過程中遺失。這種情況可能是其他物件在序列化過程中有不當行為所造成的。

trans-unit.source: Members of type '{0}' cannot be serialized.
trans-unit.target: 無法序列化 '{0}' 類型的成員。

trans-unit.source: The source code contains a reference to the class definition, but the class definition cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: 原始程式碼含有類別定義的參考，但是找不到這個類別定義。

trans-unit.source: The object '{0}' failed to serialize itself. It may not support code generation.
trans-unit.target: 物件 '{0}' 無法序列化它本身。它可能不支援程式碼產生。

trans-unit.source: The type '{0}' has no event named '{1}'.
trans-unit.target: 類型 '{0}' 沒有名為 '{1}' 的事件。

trans-unit.source: The type '{0}' has no field named '{1}'.
trans-unit.target: 類型 '{0}' 沒有名為 '{1}' 的欄位。

trans-unit.source: The type '{0}' has no property named '{1}'.
trans-unit.target: 類型 '{0}' 沒有名為 '{1}' 的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Error reading resources from the resource file for the culture {0}: {1}
trans-unit.target: 從資源檔案讀取文化特性 {0} 的資源時發生錯誤: {1}

trans-unit.source: Error reading resources from the resource file for the default culture: {0}
trans-unit.target: 從資源檔案讀取預設文化特性的資源時發生錯誤: {0}

trans-unit.source: Could not find type '{0}'. Please make sure that the assembly that contains this type is referenced. If this type is a part of your development project, make sure that the project has been successfully built using settings for your current platform or Any CPU.
trans-unit.target: 找不到類型 '{0}'。請確認已經參考包含此類型的組件。如果此類型是您開發專案的一部分，請確認此專案是否已使用您目前平台的設定或 [Any CPU] 成功建置。

trans-unit.source: The variable '{0}' is either undeclared or was never assigned.
trans-unit.target: 變數名稱 '{0}' 尚未宣告或沒有指派。

trans-unit.source: Argument should be a non-empty string.
trans-unit.target: 引數必須是非空白字串。

trans-unit.source: Property {0} requires an argument of type {1}.
trans-unit.target: 屬性 {0} 需要類型 {1} 的引數。

trans-unit.source: Toolbox item cannot be modified.
trans-unit.target: 無法修改工具箱的項目。

trans-unit.source: Data type {0} is not serializable. Items added to a property dictionary must be serializable.
trans-unit.target: 資料類型 {0} 不可序列化。要加入至屬性字典的項目必須是可序列化的。

trans-unit.source: Type '{0}' is not available in the target framework.
trans-unit.target: 類型 '{0}' 不適用於此目標 Framework。

trans-unit.target: 將 {0} 重新命名為 {1}

trans-unit.source: The service {0} is required but could not be found. If you have removed this service ensure that you provide a replacement.
trans-unit.target: 找不到必要的服務 {0}。如果您已移除這項服務，請務必提供替代的服務。
